name: py-grayskull

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Project to generate recipes for conda packages.

dependencies.name: py-beautifulsoup4
dependencies.description:
Beautiful Soup is a Python library for pulling data out of HTML and XML
files. It works with your favorite parser to provide idiomatic ways of
navigating, searching, and modifying the parse tree.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pkginfo
dependencies.description: Query metadatdata from sdists / bdists / installed packages.

dependencies.name: py-progressbar2
dependencies.description: A progress bar for Python 2 and Python 3

dependencies.name: py-rapidfuzz
dependencies.description:
Rapid fuzzy string matching in Python and C++ using the Levenshtein
Distance.

dependencies.name: py-ruamel-yaml
dependencies.description:
a YAML parser/emitter that supports roundtrip preservation of comments,
seq/map flow style, and map key order

dependencies.name: py-ruamel-yaml-jinja2
dependencies.description: jinja2 pre and post-processor to update with YAML.

dependencies.name: py-semver
dependencies.description: A Python module for semantic versioning. Simplifies comparing versions.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-stdlib-list
dependencies.description:
This package includes lists of all of the standard libraries for Python,
along with the code for scraping the official Python docs to get said
lists.

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.
